com.continuuity.weave.kafka.client
Interface KafkaClient

All Superinterfaces:
com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
public interface KafkaClient
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

This interface provides methods for interacting with kafka broker. It also extends from Service for lifecycle management. The Service.start() method must be called prior to other methods in this class. When instance of this class is not needed, call Service.stop()} to release any resources that it holds.

getOffset

com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<long[]> getOffset(String topic,
                                                                     int partition,
                                                                     long time,
                                                                     int maxOffsets)
Fetches offset from the given topic and partition.

Parameters:
topic - Topic to fetch from.
partition - Partition to fetch from.
time - The first offset of every segment file for a given partition with a modified time less than time. -1 for latest offset, -2 for earliest offset.
maxOffsets - Maximum number of offsets to fetch.
Returns:
A Future that carry the result as an array of offsets in descending order. The size of the result array would not be larger than maxOffsets. If there is any error during the fetch, the exception will be carried in the exception.
